imdb.plot outline: This special reveals the hidden secrets, double lives and unrelenting damage caused by truths that family members keep from each other. It's a fascinating trip deep into the world of deception and the horror stories withheld from the people we love most. Hear the true stories of two such families who were devastated by lies, deceptions and unspeakable violence.
imdb.title: Family Secrets
plot: This special reveals the hidden secrets, double lives and unrelenting damage caused by truths that family members keep from each other.
